column1: S063D.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S063D.DECK.  063. SURVEY NUMBER
S063D.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S063D.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  01. 18 YEARS OR YOUNGER 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 YEARS 10. 30-34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY? E. SECTION:  01. NEW ENGLAND 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 08. MOUNTAIN 09. PACIFIC 10. FOREIGN - U.S. POSSESSION 11. FOREIGN - NOT U.S. 12. U.S. - STATE NOT SPECIFIED 00. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 6 AND 7 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S063D.Q6. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED, OR WIDOWED? F. IF MARRIED:  Q.7. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY?  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 6. MARRIED, BUT NO INDICATION WHEN 7. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S063D.Q8. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE?  1. HAVE ONE CHILD 2. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 3. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 4. I HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED 6. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q9. IS YOUR WIFE NOW EXPECTING A BABY?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q10. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARMY?  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. ENLISTED RESERVE CORPS (ERC), REGULAR ARMY RESERVE (RAR), RESERVE OFFICER TRAINING CORPS (ROTC) 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q11. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY? E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q12. HAS THE ARMY CLASSIFIED YOU AS A LIMITED SERVICE MAN?  1. YES, THE ARMY HAS CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE 2. NO, THE ARMY HAS NOT CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE 3. I DON'T KNOW WHETHER THE ARMY HAS CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 13 NOT CODED.
S063D.Q14. WHAT KIND OF WORK WOULD YOU LIKE TO DO AFTER THE WAR?  1. SAME AS I DID BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 2. SOME OTHER KIND OF WORK 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q15. HOW MANY YEARS WAS IT BETWEEN THE TIME YOU LEFT FULL-TIME SCHOOL AND THE TIME YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. 1 YEAR OR LESS 2. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 3. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 4. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 5. OVER 4 YEARS UP TO 5 YEARS 6. OVER 5 YEARS 7. I CAME INTO THE ARMY RIGHT OUT OF SCHOOL 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q16A. IF YOU COULD DO WHAT YOU WANTED, WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 16B NOT CODED.

S063D.Q17A. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU WANT TO DO, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL ACTUALLY GO BACK TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE AFTER THE WAR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTIONS 17B AND 18 NOT CODED.

S063D.Q19. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE CAMP WHERE YOU ARE NOW STATIONED?  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q20. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. CAVALRY 15. FINANCE 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q21. IF YOU HAD A CHOICE, WHICH ONE OF THESE BRANCHES OF THE ARMY WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE IN?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. CAVALRY 15. FINANCE 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q22. ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU GO TO ANY TOWN OR CITY SINCE YOU'VE BEEN IN THIS CAMP?  1. ONCE EVERY 2 OR 3 WEEKS 2. ONCE A WEEK 3. TWICE A WEEK 4. THREE OR MORE TIMES A WEEK 5. LESS THAN ONCE A MONTH 6. ONCE A MONTH 7. NEVER 8. I LIVE OFF THE POST IN A TOWN OR CITY 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q23. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR CAMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP)*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q24. HOW INTERESTED ARE YOU IN YOUR ARMY JOB?  1. VERY MUCH INTERESTED 2. A LITTLE BUT NOT MUCH 3. NOT INTERESTED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q25. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANCE?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q26. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NOT?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q27. DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE GOOD IN THE ARMY?  1. I FEEL PRETTY SURE I CAN MAKE GOOD 2. I AM NOT SO SURE I CAN MAKE GOOD 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q28. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARMY?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q29. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRITS?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q30. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSET?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q31. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE IN?  1. IN A COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 2. IN A NON-COMBAT OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. IN AN OUTFIT THAT WILL STAY IN THE UNITED STATES 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q32. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JOB?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q33. SINCE YOU'VE BEEN IN THIS CAMP, ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU READ THE NEWS OF THE DAY IN A NEWSPAPER (NOT A CAMP NEWSPAPER)*  1. LESS THAN ONCE A WEEK 2. ABOUT ONCE A WEEK 3. TWO OR MORE TIMES A WEEK 4. EVERY DAY 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q34. SINCE YOU'VE BEEN IN THIS CAMP, ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU LISTEN TO NEWS BROADCASTS OVER THE RADIO?  1. ABOUT ONCE A DAY 2. TWO OR MORE TIMES A DAY 3. LESS THAN ONCE A WEEK 4. ABOUT ONCE A WEEK 5. TWO OR MORE TIMES A WEEK 0. NO ANSWER ******************************NEWSMAPS************************* P. THE NEWSMAP IS A LARGE POSTER PUT OUT BY THE WAR DEPARTMENT ONCE A WEEK AND POSTED IN ARMY CAMPS. IT HAS MAPS, PICTURES AND NEWS OF THE FIGHTING FRONTS.
S063D.Q35. HAVE YOU EVER SEEN THE ARMY "NEWSMAP" IN THIS CAMP?  1. YES, I HAVE SEEN IT IN THIS CAMP 2. NO, BUT I HAVE SEEN IT IN SOME OTHER CAMP 3. NO, I HAVE NEVER SEEN IT 4. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  1. BARRACKS 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  407 1. ORDERLY ROOM 2727 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  55 1. MESS HALL 3079 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  1160 1. DAY ROOM 1974 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  83 1. RECREATION HALL (REC HALL) 3051 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  29 1. POST EXCHANGE (P.X.) 3105 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  75 1. SERVICE CLUB 3059 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  202 1. OTHER 2932 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  32 1. THREE OR MORE ANSWERS CHECKED ABOVE 3102 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  915 1. I HAVE NEVER SEEN A NEWSMAP IN THIS CAMP 2219 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q36. WHERE IS THE NEWSMAP HUNG IN THIS CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE PLACE WHERE YOU SEE IT MOST OFTEN.)  23 1. NO ANSWER 3111 2. NOT CHOSEN

S063D.Q37. DO YOU LOOK AT THE NEW NEWSMAP EVERY WEEK?  1. YES, I LOOK AT THE NEW ONE EVERY WEEK 2. NO, I LOOK AT A NEW ONE LESS THAN ONCE A MONTH 3. NO, I LOOK AT A NEW ONE ABOUT ONCE A MONTH 4. NO, I LOOK AT A NEW ONE 2 OR 3 TIMES A MONTH 5. I HAVE NEVER SEEN A NEWSMAP IN THIS CAMP 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 38 NOT CODED.

S063D.Q39. WHERE DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST PLACE TO HANG UP A NEWSMAP?  118 1. ORDERLY ROOM 3016 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q39. WHERE DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST PLACE TO HANG UP A NEWSMAP?  88 1. MESS HALL 3046 2. NOT CHOSEN

S063D.Q39. WHERE DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST PLACE TO HANG UP A NEWSMAP?  84 1. RECREATION HALL (REC HALL) 3050 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q39. WHERE DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST PLACE TO HANG UP A NEWSMAP?  69 1. POST EXCHANGE (P.X.) 3065 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q39. WHERE DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST PLACE TO HANG UP A NEWSMAP?  43 1. SERVICE CLUB 3091 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q39. WHERE DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST PLACE TO HANG UP A NEWSMAP?  82 1. OTHER 3052 2. NOT CHOSEN

S063D.Q39. WHERE DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST PLACE TO HANG UP A NEWSMAP?  53 1. NO ANSWER 3081 2. NOT CHOSEN
S063D.Q40. DO YOU USUALLY LOOK AT THE MAPS ON THE NEWSMAP?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I HAVE NEVER SEEN A NEWSMAP IN THIS CAMP 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q41. DO YOU USUALLY LOOK AT THE PICTURES ON THE NEWSMAP?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I HAVE NEVER SEEN A NEWSMAP IN THIS CAMP 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q42. DO YOU USUALLY READ THE NEWS REPORTS ON THE NEWSMAP?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I HAVE NEVER SEEN A NEWSMAP IN THIS CAMP 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q43. HOW MUCH HELP IS THE NEWSMAP TO YOU, IN KEEPING UP WITH THE WAR NEWS?  1. IT HELPS ME A LOT 2. IT HELPS ME SOMEWHAT 3. IT HARDLY HELPS ME AT ALL 4. I HAVE NEVER SEEN A NEWSMAP IN THIS CAMP 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q44. DO YOUR OFFICERS OR NONCOMS USE THE NEWSMAP WHEN THEY GIVE TALKS ABOUT THE WAR NEWS?  1. YES, THEY USE THE NEWSMAP WHEN THEY GIVE TALKS 2. NO, THEY DO NOT USE THE NEWSMAP WHEN THEY GIVE TALKS 3. THEY DO NOT GIVE ANY TALKS ABOUT THE WAR NEWS 4. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER **********************SUMMARY OF THE WAR NEWS****************** P. IN SOME CAMPS A SUMMARY OF THE WAR NEWS IS PUT OUT EVERY DAY SPECIALLY FOR SOLDIERS. IT MAY BE HUNG UP ON A BULLETIN BOARD, PRINTED IN A CAMP NEWSPAPER OR READ OUT LOUD.

S063D.Q45. SINCE YOU'VE BEEN IN THIS CAMP, DO YOU EVER READ OR HEAR A SUMMARY OF THE WAR NEWS PUT OUT BY THE ARMY SPECIALLY FOR THE SOLDIERS IN CAMP?  1. YES, I HAVE READ OR HEARD IT IN THIS CAMP 2. NO, BUT I HAVE READ OR HEARD IT IN SOME OTHER CAMP 3. NO, I HAVE NEVER READ OR HEARD IT 4. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q46. SINCE YOU'VE BEEN IN THIS CAMP, HOW DO YOU GET THIS SUMMARY OF THE WAR NEWS THAT IS PUT OUT SPECIALLY FOR THE SOLDIERS IN CAMP? (CHECK THE ONE WAY THAT YOU GET IT MOST OFTEN.)  1. IT IS PRINTED AND I READ IT MYSELF 2. I HEAR IT AT FORMATIONS OR IN CLASS 3. I HEAR IT OVER THE CAMP LOUDSPEAKER 4. SOME OTHER WAY 5. I HAVE NEVER READ OR HEARD IT IN THIS CAMP 6. IF 1 AND 2 CHECKED ABOVE 7. IF 1 AND 3 CHECKED ABOVE 8. IF 2 AND 3 CHECKED ABOVE 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q47. SINCE YOU'VE BEEN IN THIS CAMP, ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU READ OR HEAR THIS SUMMARY OF THE WAR NEWS THAT IS PUT OUT SPECIALLY FOR THE SOLDIERS IN CAMP?  1. LESS THAN ONCE A WEEK 2. ABOUT ONCE A WEEK 3. TWO OR MORE TIMES A WEEK 4. EVERY DAY 5. I HAVE NEVER READ OR HEARD IT IN THIS CAMP 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q48. HOW MUCH HELP ARE THESE WAR NEWS SUMMARIES TO YOU, IN KEEPING UP WITH THE WAR NEWS?  1. THEY HELP ME A LOT 2. THEY HELP ME SOMEWHAT 3. THEY HARDLY HELP ME AT ALL 4. I HAVE NEVER READ OR HEARD ANY IN THIS CAMP 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q49. WHICH DO YOU THINK GIVES YOU A TRUER IDEA OF WHAT IS GOING ON IN THE U.S. AND IN THE WORLD - THE SUMMARIES OF THE WAR NEWS PUT OUT SPECIALLY FOR THE SOLDIERS OR THE DAILY NEWSPAPERS?  1. THE SUMMARIES OF THE NEWS PUT OUT SPECIALLY FOR THE SOLDIERS 2. THE DAILY NEWSPAPERS (NOT CAMP NEWSPAPERS) 3. IT MAKES NO DIFFERENCE 4. I HAVE NEVER READ OR HEARD ANY NEWS SUMMARIES PUT OUT SPECIALLY FOR SOLDIERS 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q50. HOW GOOD A JOB DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS DOING IN KEEPING THE SOLDIERS IN THIS CAMP UP-TO-DATE ON THE NEWS OF THE DAY?  1. VERY GOOD JOB 2. FAIRLY GOOD JOB 3. PRETTY POOR JOB 4. VERY POOR JOB 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q51. DO YOU THINK THE WAR NEWS SENT OUT BY THE ARMY MAKES THINGS LOOK BETTER THAN THEY REALLY ARE, WORSE THAN THEY REALLY ARE, OR ABOUT THE SAME AS THEY REALLY ARE?  1. IT MAKES THINGS LOOK BETTER THAN THEY ARE 2. IT MAKES THINGS LOOK WORSE THAN THEY ARE 3. IT MAKES THINGS LOOK ABOUT THE SAME AS THEY REALLY ARE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q52. HOW WOULD YOU RATE YOURSELF WITH REGARD TO A KNOWLEDGE OF WORLD EVENTS AND RECENT NEWS?  1. HAVE A FAIRLY COMPLETE AND UP-TO-DATE KNOWLEDGE 2. HAVE A GENERAL KNOWLEDGE OF "HEADLINE" EVENTS 3. DO NOT KEEP UP WITH THE NEWS 0. NO ANSWER CARD 2
S063D.CARD.  2. CARD TWO

S063D.Q53. IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A FAIRLY COMPLETE AND UP-TO-DATE KNOWLEDGE OF THE NEWS, IS IT MAINLY BECAUSE ...*  1. YOU WANT TO BUT DON'T HAVE THE FACILITIES (NEWSPAPERS, RADIO) 2. YOU WANT TO BUT DON'T HAVE THE TIME 3. YOU ARE JUST NOT PARTICULARLY INTERESTED 4. I DO HAVE A FAIRLY COMPLETE AND UP-TO-DATE KNOWLEDGE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 54 NOT CODED.

S063D.Q57. WOULD YOU RATHER GET A NEWS REPORT WHICH TELLS THE FACTS OF THE NEWS, OR ONE THAT TELLS THE FACTS AND ALSO EXPLAINS THEM?  1. NEWS REPORT WHICH TELLS THE FACTS 2. NEWS REPORT WHICH TELLS THE FACTS AND ALSO EXPLAINS THEM 3. IT MAKES NO DIFFERENCE 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q58. IN GENERAL, WOULD YOU SAY THAT YOU KEEP UP WITH THE NEWS MORE CLOSELY NOW, ABOUT THE SAME, OR LESS CLOSELY NOW THAN YOU DID BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY?  1. I KEEP UP MORE CLOSELY NOW 2. I KEEP UP ABOUT THE SAME 3. I KEEP UP LESS CLOSELY NOW 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q59. WHAT DO YOU THINK IS THE MAIN REASON YOU DO NOT KEEP UP MORE CLOSELY WITH THE NEWS?  1. I HAVE LESS INTEREST IN THE NEWS NOW 2. I DON'T HAVE ANY GOOD WAY OF GETTING THE NEWS 3. I JUST DON'T HAVE TIME TO KEEP UP WITH THE NEWS 4. I DO KEEP UP CLOSELY WITH THE NEWS 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q60. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO BE ABLE TO GET THE NEWS OF THE DAY WHILE YOU ARE IN THE ARMY?  1. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY 2. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE 4. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE 5. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q61A. "YOU CAN'T BELIEVE MUCH OF WHAT YOU READ IN THE ARMY NEWS REPORTS THESE DAYS*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. DON'T KNOW 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S063D.Q61B. "IF IT'S A NEWS REPORT SENT OUT BY THE ARMY THEN YOU KNOW IT MUST BE THE TRUTH*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q61C. "THE ARMY TRIES TO HIDE THE REALLY BAD NEWS FROM THE SOLDIERS*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q61D. "YOU CAN COUNT ON THE ARMY TO PRINT ALL THE IMPORTANT NEWS, EVEN IF IT IS UNFAVORABLE TO THE ARMY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q62. DO YOU FIND THAT THE LONGER YOU ARE IN THE ARMY, YOU GET MORE INTERESTED OR LESS INTERESTED IN NEWS OF THE FIGHTING FRONTS?  1. I GET MORE AND MORE INTERESTED 2. I GET LESS AND LESS INTERESTED 3. I STAY ABOUT THE SAME 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q63. DO YOU FIND THAT THE LONGER YOU ARE IN THE ARMY, YOU GET MORE INTERESTED OR LESS INTERESTED IN NEWS OF THE HOME FRONT?  1. I GET MORE AND MORE INTERESTED 2. I GET LESS AND LESS INTERESTED 3. I STAY ABOUT THE SAME 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q64. DO YOU FIND THAT THE LONGER YOU ARE IN THE ARMY, YOU THINK MORE, OR LESS, ABOUT WHY WE ARE FIGHTING THIS WAR?  1. I THINK MORE AND MORE ABOUT IT 2. I THINK LESS AND LESS ABOUT IT 3. I THINK ABOUT IT THE SAME AMOUNT 0. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q65. DURING YOUR TRAINING YOU PROBABLY HAVE SEEN FILMS ABOUT WHY WE ARE FIGHTING THIS WAR. DO YOU THINK THESE FILMS GAVE YOU THE REAL FACTS OR DO YOU THINK THEY WERE FIXED UP TO MAKE IT LOOK GOOD FOR OUR SIDE?  1. ALL WERE FACTS 2. MOST WERE FACTS 3. ABOUT HALF WERE FACTS AND HALF WERE FIXED UP TO LOOK GOOD FOR OUR SIDE 4. MOST WERE FIXED UP TO LOOK GOOD FOR OUR SIDE 5. ALL WERE FIXED UP TO LOOK GOOD FOR OUR SIDE 6. I HAVEN'T SEEN ANY FILMS ABOUT WHY WE ARE FIGHTING 7. UNDECIDED 8. NO ANSWER

S063D.Q66. DURING YOUR TRAINING YOU PROBABLY HAVE HEARD TALKS ABOUT WHY WE ARE FIGHTING THIS WAR. DO YOU THINK THESE TALKS GAVE YOU THE REAL FACTS OR DO YOU THINK THEY WERE FIXED UP TO MAKE IT LOOK GOOD FOR OUR SIDE?  1. ALL WERE FACTS 2. MOST WERE FACTS 3. ABOUT HALF WERE FACTS AND HALF WERE FIXED UP TO LOOK GOOD FOR OUR SIDE 4. MOST WERE FIXED UP TO LOOK GOOD FOR OUR SIDE 5. ALL WERE FIXED UP TO LOOK GOOD FOR OUR SIDE 6. I HAVEN'T HEARD ANY TALKS ABOUT WHY WE ARE FIGHTING 7. UNDECIDED 8. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S063D.Q67C. DID YOU SEE "DIVIDE AND CONQUER"* (THIS SHOWS THE GERMAN INVASION OF NORWAY, THE LOW COUNTRIES, AND THE DEFEAT OF FRANCE.)  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S063D.Q67D. DID YOU SEE "THE BATTLE OF BRITAIN"* (THIS SHOWS THE GERMAN AIR BOMBINGS OF ENGLAND RIGHT AFTER THE DEFEAT OF FRANCE.)  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
